item.title: Report E-2024070528
item.description:
Report E-2024070528

Identified by scraper @ 2024-07-26T18:15:58+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-06-17
  • City: LAWRENCEVILLE
  • State: GA
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: XPO
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: It was reported that approximately 1-gallon of Xylol was released from a 1-gallon metal pail due to improper loading by XAU. Product has already evaporated. The release impacted trailer #3113649. ERTS reviewed the SDS with the caller and they felt comfortable cleaning up the release with PPE available on-site.

  • Description: On 06/10/2024, during cruise phase of flight DL75 (AMS-ATL), a passenger's vape pen wÂ¿s observed to be warm and smoking. The device was placed in bucket and submerged in water. The vape smoke was mitigated. The flight continued to destination without further incident. No flight crew or customer injuries were reported. The NRC and FAA were notified.F
